actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to provide that any claim arising out of the loss, miscarriage, or negligent transmission of letters or postal matter be subject to the provisions of the Federal Tort Claims Act.

summary.text: Amends the Federal Torts Claim Act to subject to the provisions of the Act any claim arising out of the loss, miscarriage, or negligent transmission of letters or postal matter.

titles.title: A bill to provide that any claim arising out of the loss, miscarriage, or negligent transmission of letters or postal matter be subject to the provisions of the Federal Tort Claims Act.
